title: Julian Smith – 2022 Comments on the Attack on Keir Starmer
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Julian Smith, the Conservative MP for Skipton and Ripon, on 7 February 2022.
content:
What happened to Keir Starmer tonight outside Parliament is appalling. It is really important for our democracy and for his security that the false Savile slurs made against him are withdrawn in full.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
